title: How to reduce data usage on my phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Be sure to download all your music, podcasts, maps and documents you'll be needing on the road, while you are still connected to WiFi. If you're moving around in familiar territory you should become aware of all the WiFi connections that are available in restaurants coffee shops Etc. Accessing your phone's local files and looking for a free WiFi helps people use little or no cell data. Hope this helps.

Data usage of yours phone is up to you. The amount you use the amount it cost. But you can stop the unwantd usage by stopping the background data if you are on android. To slow down the usage of data while browsing you cAn select image quality to low/medium . If you want extreme saving just switch back to 2g network :p
